Operation 'get_/fact/categories' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, not_actionable. The current description is misleading - it says 'Get a random Fact' but the endpoint path suggests it retrieves categories, not facts. Missing summary entirely. The description lacks clarity about what the endpoint actually returns (categories list), what inputs are expected, and the purpose of the operation. AI agents need to understand this is a discovery/metadata endpoint, not a fact retrieval endpoint.

data.description_suggestion: Returns a list of all available fact categories that can be used with the Facts API. This operation helps clients discover which categories are supported for random fact retrieval, fact-of-the-day queries, and other category-based operations. No parameters required. Returns an array of category names/identifiers.
data.reasoning: The current description is misleading - it says 'Get a random Fact' but the endpoint path suggests it retrieves categories, not facts. Missing summary entirely. The description lacks clarity about what the endpoint actually returns (categories list), what inputs are expected, and the purpose of the operation. AI agents need to understand this is a discovery/metadata endpoint, not a fact retrieval endpoint.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/numbers' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't explain input parameters (whether a number can be specified or if it's always random), output structure, or use cases. AI agents need to know if they can request facts about specific numbers or only receive random ones, and what the response structure contains.

data.current_description: Get a random fact about a number
data.description_suggestion: Returns a random interesting fact about a number. The operation can optionally accept a specific number as input; if no number is provided, a random number is selected. Returns a fact object containing the number and its associated interesting fact. Useful for trivia, educational content, or random number fact generation.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too brief and doesn't explain input parameters (whether a number can be specified or if it's always random), output structure, or use cases. AI agents need to know if they can request facts about specific numbers or only receive random ones, and what the response structure contains.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/onthisday/born' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks clarity about output structure and what fields are returned in the response. The parenthetical notation about 'famous/relatively famous' is informal. AI agents need to understand the exact parameters required (day, month format) and what data structure is returned to properly use this operation.

data.current_description: Returns a random ( famous/ relatively famous ) person born on a given day and month
data.summary_suggestion: Get random famous person born on date
data.description_suggestion: Returns a random famous or relatively famous person born on a specified day and month. Requires day and month parameters (year is not required). Returns a person object containing name, birth date, and biographical information. Useful for historical trivia and 'on this day' features.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks clarity about output structure and what fields are returned in the response. The parenthetical notation about 'famous/relatively famous' is informal. AI agents need to understand the exact parameters required (day, month format) and what data structure is returned to properly use this operation.

message: Operation 'get_/fact' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Missing summary entirely. Description is too vague about what 'id' refers to and doesn't clarify return format or whether authentication is needed. Added clarity about public vs private facts, parameter requirements, and return structure for better AI agent routing.

data.current_description: Get a Fact belonging to the id.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a specific fact entry by its unique identifier. Supports both public random facts and private user-stored facts. Returns the complete fact object including content, category, and metadata. Requires the fact ID as a path or query parameter.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is too vague about what 'id' refers to and doesn't clarify return format or whether authentication is needed. Added clarity about public vs private facts, parameter requirements, and return structure for better AI agent routing.

message: Operation 'put_/fact' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. Description lacks detail about required parameters, authentication requirement, and what is returned. Added specifics about input parameters, authentication, return value with ID assignment, and persistence behavior to improve AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Add a Fact entry to the database (private collection).
data.summary_suggestion: Create a new private fact entry
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new fact entry in the user's private collection. Requires authentication. Accepts fact content, category, subcategory, and optional metadata as input parameters. Returns the newly created fact object with assigned ID and timestamp. The fact is immediately stored and accessible via subsequent GET requests.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks detail about required parameters, authentication requirement, and what is returned. Added specifics about input parameters, authentication, return value with ID assignment, and persistence behavior to improve AI agent understanding of when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'delete_/fact' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. Description doesn't specify authentication requirement, ownership validation, or permanence of deletion. Added context about authentication, ownership check, confirmation response, and irreversibility to help AI agents understand the destructive nature and prerequisites of this operation.

data.current_description: Delete a Fact entry identified by the id.
data.description_suggestion: Deletes a specific fact entry from the user's private collection by its unique identifier. Requires authentication and ownership of the fact. Returns confirmation of deletion. The fact is permanently removed and no longer accessible. This action cannot be undone.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description doesn't specify authentication requirement, ownership validation, or permanence of deletion. Added context about authentication, ownership check, confirmation response, and irreversibility to help AI agents understand the destructive nature and prerequisites of this operation.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/fod' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description doesn't explain the daily refresh behavior, parameter requirements, or return format. Added context about daily refresh cycle, consistency within a day, category parameter requirement, and return structure to help AI agents understand this operation's unique temporal behavior.

data.current_description: Get fact of the day for the given category.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the fact of the day for a specified category. Returns a single fact that is refreshed daily. The same fact is returned for all requests on the same calendar day within the same category. Requires a valid category parameter (see /fact/fod/categories for available options). Returns the fact object with content, category, and publication date.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description doesn't explain the daily refresh behavior, parameter requirements, or return format. Added context about daily refresh cycle, consistency within a day, category parameter requirement, and return structure to help AI agents understand this operation's unique temporal behavior.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/random' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description uses informal syntax '(optional)' instead of clear parameter documentation. Doesn't explain return format or behavior. Added formal parameter documentation, clarification that results vary per request, and complete return object structure for better AI agent understanding of filtering options and expected output.

data.current_description: Get a random Fact for a given category(optional) and subcategory(optional).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a random fact, optionally filtered by category and subcategory. Both category and subcategory parameters are optional; if omitted, a fact from any category is returned. Returns a single fact object with content, category, subcategory, and metadata. Each request returns a different random fact (unless by chance).
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description uses informal syntax '(optional)' instead of clear parameter documentation. Doesn't explain return format or behavior. Added formal parameter documentation, clarification that results vary per request, and complete return object structure for better AI agent understanding of filtering options and expected output.

message: Operation 'get_/fact/search' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is awkwardly phrased ('random Fact which has the text') and uses informal parameter syntax. Doesn't clarify search behavior, matching rules, or what happens when no results found. Improved clarity on search mechanics, case-sensitivity, partial matching, and empty result handling for better AI agent understanding of search functionality.

data.current_description: Search for random Fact which has the text in the query, for a given category(optional) and subcategory(optional).
data.description_suggestion: Searches for facts containing specified text in their content. Supports optional filtering by category and subcategory to narrow results. Requires a search query parameter containing the text to match. Returns a random fact from matching results, or an empty result if no facts match the criteria. Search is case-insensitive and matches partial text.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is awkwardly phrased ('random Fact which has the text') and uses informal parameter syntax. Doesn't clarify search behavior, matching rules, or what happens when no results found. Improved clarity on search mechanics, case-sensitivity, partial matching, and empty result handling for better AI agent understanding of search functionality.
